org.scilab.modules.scinotes
Class ScilabDocument

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.text.AbstractDocument
      javax.swing.text.PlainDocument
          org.scilab.modules.scinotes.ScilabDocument
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.DocumentListener, javax.swing.text.Document
public class ScilabDocument
extends javax.swing.text.PlainDocument
implements javax.swing.event.DocumentListener

The class ScilabDocument is used to render a document .sci or .sce

See Also:
Serialized Form

Nested Class Summary
 class ScilabDocument.Anchor
          Inner class to get infos on anchor
 class ScilabDocument.ScilabLeafElement
          Inner class to consider the type of a line : - FUN : function y=foo(x) - ENDFUN : endfunction - NOTHING : bla bla bla This inner class is useful to make a line numbering compatible with the whereami macro.
